name: Valo: A Sandbox Roguelike
description:
Play, Mod, & Make

Valo is a survival sandbox roguelike game built on top of a custom hackable engine. Survive the sandbox, hack it to make it your own, or throw out the content and build your own game instead!

Important: This game is in early development! Expect new content, features, (and bugs + crashes 😢) during the development process! Play: A Survival Sandbox Roguelike

A base built from a town in the forest

Build, Farm, Craft, & Explore to survive in the simulated world.

  • Gather resources and to build your base and upgrade your gear
  • Explore infinite cave systems and sprawling forests
  • Farm a large variety of flora

While much of the content is still in development, here are some of the things you can do right now:

  • Summon a bolt of lightning to smite a giant ant and accidentally start a forest fire
  • Discover a clothing shop in a small village and put buckets on the mannequins heads
  • Build a throne room for your castle with floors made of solid gold
  • Discover a spider in your base and promptly burn the whole thing down
  • Turn your farm into a mud pit by accidentally digging an irrigation canal that is too wide
  • Walk forever in the infinite map in an attempt to preoccupy yourself and escape your loneliness
  • Throw a brick at a snake
  • Blow apart a cliff-side using explosives and celebrate with fireworks
Mod: Customize Anything

Custom laser rifle mod

  • Create new items, creatures, tiles, world generators, animations, quests, and more!
  • Nearly all the content in the base game is built using external configuration files and Lua scripts
  • Built-in package system for keeping mods organized
Make: Build New Games

A space exploration roguelike written using Valo (in development)

  • Use Valo as a starting point for your new roguelike game
  • Write custom world generators, creature AIs, and items
  • Use custom tiles, fonts, and splash screens to make the game your own
Engine features:
  • Ever expanding Lua API and in-game terminal
  • Custom world generators, items, creatures, and tiles
  • Dynamic lighting and animation
  • Built in tools for sprite generation (image I/O and editing), reading/writing custom data to the world, publisher/subscriber signals, and much more
